about_the_game:
This source file collection includes formats in FBX and MAX (3ds Max 2020).
MAX files: The materials rely on the 3ds Max material system. Complete material rendering settings are provided.
FBX files: Only include the model itself, and the compatibility of materials is not guaranteed.
Note: Some models depend on the Quad Chamfer plugin. For more information, please visit:
Note: Please ensure that you have the necessary software and format compatibility.

Features

MAX files retain the production process, facilitating modifications.
This model library does not contain content from other public model libraries (e.g., free plant libraries, environmental libraries). Please download these separately.
The renderer is compatible with Corona 5, V-Ray 5, or higher versions.
Model files can be freely used in any field, for commercial or non-commercial, original or derivative creative work.
